languages.text: Губернатор Вистенца Вьятт, допустив зарождение смуты в ее владениях, дискредитировала себя. Ввиду этого, ее грубые методы борьбы с мятежом, как и ее слуги, были признаны ненадежными.

traits.locale_text: Губернатор Вистенца Вьятт, допустив зарождение смуты в ее владениях, дискредитировала себя. Ввиду этого, ее грубые методы борьбы с мятежом, как и ее слуги, были признаны ненадежными.

languages.text: By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.
languages.original_text: Губернатор Вистенца Вьятт, допустив зарождение смуты в ее владениях, дискредитировала себя. Ввиду этого, ее грубые методы борьбы с мятежом, как и ее слуги, были признаны ненадежными.

traits.locale_text: By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

languages.text: 混乱が領地に広がったままにしておけば、総督ヴィステンツァ・ビャットの信頼は損なわれる。そのため、彼女の参謀をはじめとする人員から、反乱を抑え込む手法の粗さに疑問が呈されていた。
languages.original_text: By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

traits.locale_text: 混乱が領地に広がったままにしておけば、総督ヴィステンツァ・ビャットの信頼は損なわれる。そのため、彼女の参謀をはじめとする人員から、反乱を抑え込む手法の粗さに疑問が呈されていた。

languages.text: 维丝坦萨·维亚特总督纵容动乱在她的领地扎根，这让她自己名誉扫地。有鉴于此，她镇压叛乱的笨拙手段，令她和她的幕僚都受到了质疑。
languages.original_text: By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

traits.locale_text: 维丝坦萨·维亚特总督纵容动乱在她的领地扎根，这让她自己名誉扫地。有鉴于此，她镇压叛乱的笨拙手段，令她和她的幕僚都受到了质疑。

languages.text: Al permitir que el descontento arraigase en sus dominios, la gobernadora Vistenza Vyatt se deshonró a sí misma. A la luz de tal desenlace, se han cuestionado los burdos métodos que empleó para sofocar la rebelión, así como la lealtad de su personal.
languages.original_text: By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

traits.locale_text: Al permitir que el descontento arraigase en sus dominios, la gobernadora Vistenza Vyatt se deshonró a sí misma. A la luz de tal desenlace, se han cuestionado los burdos métodos que empleó para sofocar la rebelión, así como la lealtad de su personal.

languages.text: Gouverneurin Vistenza Vyatt ließ zu, dass Unruhen in ihrem Reich Wurzeln schlagen, und hat sich damit selbst diskreditiert. Unter diesem Blickwinkel gerieten die primitiven Methoden in Verruf, mit denen sie die Rebellion niederschlug, und auch ihre Leute.
languages.original_text: By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

traits.locale_text: Gouverneurin Vistenza Vyatt ließ zu, dass Unruhen in ihrem Reich Wurzeln schlagen, und hat sich damit selbst diskreditiert. Unter diesem Blickwinkel gerieten die primitiven Methoden in Verruf, mit denen sie die Rebellion niederschlug, und auch ihre Leute.

languages.text: En laissant l'agitation s'installer dans son territoire, la gouverneure Vistenza Vyatt s'était discréditée, et à la lumière de ces événements, les méthodes brutales qu'elle avait employées pour étouffer la rébellion furent remises en question, au même titre que son personnel.
languages.original_text: By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

traits.locale_text: En laissant l'agitation s'installer dans son territoire, la gouverneure Vistenza Vyatt s'était discréditée, et à la lumière de ces événements, les méthodes brutales qu'elle avait employées pour étouffer la rébellion furent remises en question, au même titre que son personnel.

languages.text: Vali Vistenza Vyatt, hükmü altındaki topraklarda huzursuzluğun meydana gelmesine müsaade ederek kendi itibarını zedeledi. Bu sebepten dolayı isyanı bastırmak için valinin kullandığı ilkel yöntemler tahkik edildi, emrindekiler sorguya çekildi.
languages.original_text: By permitting unrest to take root in her dominion, Governor Vistenza Vyatt discredited herself. In light of this, the crude methods she used to repress the rebellion were called into question, as was her staff.

traits.locale_text: Vali Vistenza Vyatt, hükmü altındaki topraklarda huzursuzluğun meydana gelmesine müsaade ederek kendi itibarını zedeledi. Bu sebepten dolayı isyanı bastırmak için valinin kullandığı ilkel yöntemler tahkik edildi, emrindekiler sorguya çekildi.
